Shortly before, a suicide bomber had rammed a car with explosives next to the restaurant.[65]

Location: <img alt="Afghanistan" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Afghanistan.svg/23px-Flag_of_Afghanistan.svg.png" width="23" height="15" class="thumbborder" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400"> Kabul, Afghanistan
Details: Six persons were killed and ten others were injured when a suicide bomber detonated his explosive vest in a crowded Shia mosque. The Tablian has rejected any involvement in the attack.[66]
